Package com.example.sphinxevents

Class NotificationsHelper

java.lang.Object
com.example.sphinxevents.NotificationsHelper
public class NotificationsHelper extends Object
A helper class for sending notifications to users. Defines the channel IDs for consistency. Implements multiple methods that act as a template for certain automated notifications.

    • sendLotteryWinNotification

      public static void sendLotteryWinNotification(String facility, String eventName, ArrayList<String> recipients, DatabaseManager.NotificationCreationCallback callback)
      Sends a notification to lottery winners for an event
      Parameters:
      facility - The facility that created the event
      eventName - The name of the event lottery is for
      recipients - An array of user ID's that receive the notification
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of notification creation

    • sendLotteryLossNotification

      public static void sendLotteryLossNotification(String facility, String eventName, ArrayList<String> recipients, DatabaseManager.NotificationCreationCallback callback)
      Sends a notification to lottery participants who were not initially selected.
      Parameters:
      facility - The facility hosting the event
      eventName - The name of the event
      recipients - List of user IDs to notify
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of notification creation

      Sends a custom organizer notification with a provided title and message.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the notification
      message - The message content of the notification
      recipients - List of user IDs to notify
